titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the marriage penalty in the contribution rules for Roth IRAs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/21/2003--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to ROTH IRAs, to eliminate the marriage penalty for the phaseout range, the phaseout threshold, and rollover amounts.
